Title: As China commemorates 80th anniversary of WWII, battle over legacy of war continues
Description:
A military parade in Beijing marking the end of World War II will draw leaders from around the world.
It's an opportunity for the Communist Party to shape the narrative surrounding the end of the war.

Title: Whatever happened to mpox? Is it still a threat?
Description:
The virus took the world by storm.
It was declared a "public health emergency of continental concern." What's the current status? With the U.S.
aid cuts, one doctor says, "We're flying blind."

Title: Starter homes are scarce, so Utah set a target to build more. Here's how it's going
Description:
In one of the country's priciest housing markets, Utah's leaders worry young people are shut out from building wealth.
But despite new incentives, few developers are signing on to build smaller homes.

Title: Chinese Cluster Now World's Top Innovation Hotspot, UN Says
Description:
Shenzhen-Hong Kong-Guangzhou has overtaken Tokyo-Yokohama to become the world's top cluster for innovation, the United Nations said Monday.

Description: Her advice to young professionals is to "not be afraid of change."

Title: Russia's maker of T-series tanks is using hundreds of Western and foreign equipment pieces: Ukrainian intelligence
Description: While GUR said the "vast majority" of this equipment was bought before the war, it's urging manufacturers to watch their supplies of spare parts.

Title: Were you at Burning Man? Officials want help identifying victim found in 'pool of blood'
Description: Investigators are seeking information big or small that could help them identify a homicide victim at the festival.

Title: Body seen in secret mortuary could solve 50-year mystery of vanished religious leader

Title: Light Sleep: Waking VMs in 200ms with eBPF and snapshots
